data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smit, Harry (2017): Notoaturine water mites from New Zealand (Acari: Hydrachnidia: Notoaturinae) with the description of five new species. Zootaxa 4247 (1): 16-30, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4247.1.2|107 occurrences
